version_description: Minor bugs fixed
Minor bugs fixed

We’re excited to introduce you to a sophisticated Nutrition planner in BetterMe! It is a known fact that 70% of success in losing weight depends on healthy nutrition; and now we can help you to achieve great results easier.

In this update we support iPhone X! Enjoy that extra screen real-estate.

We’re excited to introduce you to a sophisticated Nutrition planner in BetterMe! It is a known fact that 70% of success in losing weight depends on healthy nutrition; now we can help you to achieve great results easier.

We believe that every change in the app helps you being healthier and are so excited to bring more updates:
- In this release, we've designed a new screen answering all the questions regarding our program and subscriptions.
- Also, we've redesigned the settings screen to make it more user-friendly and clear. Now, you can play with settings like in play yard (smile).

- BetterMe may track your lifestyle through HealthKit and analyze it to give you more accurate feedback and advice.

BetterMe values users’ privacy and we’ve updated our Privacy policy to explain more about how we use your data to create a better experience. Please review the updated Privacy policy.

Oh, and BetterMe meals have become more sophisticated and tasty.
Oh-oh, and we’ve fixed a few of bugs.

We always strive to deliver a highly-personalized experience, and that’s why we’re happy to introduce the in-App chat! Now, you can use our chatbot or connect to a live personal trainer to get answers to all your questions.

The wait is over: the BRAND NEW BetterMe is finally here!
We are sooooo excited to bring you a completely reinvented app with tons of new content, a beautiful user-friendly design, and new features to help you get your dream body even faster!

- We now offer Journeys, a personalized unique combination of workouts and nutrition to help you reach your goals;
- All-new targeted training programs and over 1500 recipes from certified coaches and nutritionists;
- Improved Community with daily tips and articles from leading professionals;
- Personal Coach to guide you along every step of the way and answer any questions you might have;
- Along with a Water Tracker, daily Progress Graphs, Shopping List, Video Recipes and much more.

We're excited for you to try out these new features! Hope you’ll love them as much as we do! :)

BetterMe Weightloss now has a Calendar: see your daily workout and meal history along with the schedule for upcoming days!

With this update, we redesigned the active workout screen, added detailed exercise descriptions, common mistakes, and tips on how to perform them for an even better user experience. Enjoy your journey to a BetterMe!
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
With this version, we are happy to offer the app in Japanese.

With this version, you can schedule your workouts in advance to stay on track! Also, BetterMe Weightloss is now available in Korean language.
BetterMe is now available in French!
You can now contact us right from the app! Simply go to Profile, Contact Us, and let us know your comments and suggestions. Thanks for using BetterMe!

Thanks for using BetterMe! With this release, we are excited to offer you a highly-anticipated, brand-new Calorie Tracker feature! We worked hard to make it as amazing as possible to make your weight-loss journey even easier. Please enjoy!
We have fixed minor bugs in our brand-new Calorie-Tracker :)

We’ve got brand new audio-coached Walking and Running workouts for weight loss. Never ran before? No problem! With multiple programs suited even for complete beginners, you’re sure to find something just right for you.
Track you distance, location, speed and even map your route.

Hope you'll enjoy these new programs :)
Small bug fixes and performance improvements

We added the option to Log in with Apple, so that you can start using BetterMe in just a click. Now, your progress is also synced across all your devices.

Additionally, we added Health integration for all the meals you log in Calorie Tracker.
Check out the updated Walking stats! Now you can see your steps for the day, calories burned, and how much you have left to reach your goal. Also, check out weekly summary graphs!
Bug fixes and stability improvements.
Bug fixes and stability improvements.
Bug fixes and stability improvements.
You asked, we listened: the BetterMe Calorie Tracker now has a Barcode Scan feature! Use your camera to scan grocery items in a flash and let us know what you think!

Now you can track water Intake in our app both with Apple Watch and iPhone.The app will remind you to drink more water. This way you can never miss hydrating your body. Also, you can input the water intake every time you drink a bottle or a spoon right from your watch!
Thanks for using BetterMe! The app is now available in Turkish and German.

Thanks for using BetterMe! We are excited to now offer Gym workouts and content specifially for men! Enjoy!
Thanks for using BetterMe! The app is now available in Italian and Hindi.

Thanks for using BetterMe! The app is now available in Thai, Vietnamese, Polish & Dutch.

Thanks for using BetterMe! We are excited to present you with new features to make your experience even more enjoyable!

- New Voice Cues for Walking and Running workouts: audio coaching for Extra Motivation.
- Detailed Meal Analysis: See meal history, daily calorie and macros summary, and info about your BMI.
- Verified Items in Calorie Tracker: See which goods in the Calorie Tracker database are cross-checked and certified by nutritionists. To select verified positions, look for a green checkmark next to the item name.

As always, we'd love to hear your feedback on the new features!

- Detailed Meal Analysis: See meal history, daily calorie and macros summary, and info about your BMI.
- Verified Items in Calorie Tracker: See which goods in the Calorie Tracker database are cross-checked and certified by nutritionists. To select verified positions, look for a green checkmark next to the item name.

As always, we'd love to hear your feedback on the new features!

Thanks for using BetterMe!

With this release, we are excited to offer you Meal Reminders.

Get in the habit of logging your meals and you're halfway there! To make it easy, we've added (optional) notifications to help you stay on track.
As always, we'd love to hear your feedback on the new features!
With this update, we've introduced improvements to Calorie Tracker, including the ability to edit foods logged yesterday, as well as got rid of bugs. As always, thank you for using BetterMe!

Your workout now loads at the speed of light, or at least significantly faster than before. Enjoy!

Thanks to your feedback, we can make BetterMe even better. This update brings you:

- Minor product improvements
- Major squished bugs

Love BetterMe? Rate us 5 stars and share the love with the community!
Thanks for using BetterMe! With this update, we're excited to introduce Fasting. Check it out and let us know what you think!
We’ve worked hard to make the app faster, prettier and more seamless for you. Thanks for using BetterMe and as always, stay fit, healthy, and happy!

Thanks for improving your life with BetterMe!

With this update, we're excited to announce major Apple Watch App updates:

-Enjoy phone-free running and walking workouts with audio prompts
-Access Apple Music easily right from the Watch App
-Get comprehensive stats and sync them to your phone

Moreover, we are glad to bring you a completely redesigned Active Workout.

-Check out smoother and more intuitive experience during the workout
-See next exercise clearly and proceed with no interruptions.
Thanks for using BetterMe! In this update we made small improvements to make a big difference: the app is now faster, has less bugs and more activities. Stay fit, healthy and happy!
We’ve worked hard to make the app faster, prettier and more seamless for you. Thanks for using BetterMe and as always, stay fit, healthy, and happy!

Thanks for using BetterMe! We’re excited to offer you new features with the release of iOS 14!

With this update, enjoy our brand-new widgets! Widgets provide insights at a glance: calorie tracker, useful tips, and much more. Arrange Home screen to your preference to see the stats you care about most, and we’ll remind you to log your food during the day and get ready for your scheduled workout.

Moreover, BetterMe’s Apple Watch App can now be installed and used independently without the phone app! We also added BetterMe Watch faces with multiple complications to give you quick access to stats, workouts and water tracker that you can easily share with your friends.

Let us know what you think!

Thanks for using BetterMe! We’re excited to offer you new features with the release of iOS 14!

With this update, enjoy our brand-new widgets! Widgets provide insights at a glance: calorie tracker, useful tips, and much more. Arrange Home screen to your preference to see the stats you care about most, and we’ll remind you to log your food during the day and get ready for your scheduled workout.

Moreover, BetterMe’s Apple Watch App can now be installed and used independently without the phone app! We also added BetterMe Watch faces with multiple complications to give you quick access to stats, workouts and water tracker that you can easily share with your friends.

Let us know what you think!
With this update, we added motivational quotes to home screen widgets that change throughout the day. Get inspired and motivated, and achieve even Better results!
We’ve worked hard to make the app faster, prettier and more seamless for you. Thanks for using BetterMe and as always, stay fit, healthy, and happy!

Please enjoy our new large Widget! You can now get dynamic info right on your home screen reminding you to drink water; log breakfast, lunch, and dinner; and complete a workout. It also displays your step, workout time, and consumed calorie statistics. Let us know what you think!
We’ve added a new iOS14 Widget to help you track your intermittent fasting phases right from your home screen. Please enjoy and let us know what you think!

With this update, we’re thrilled to bring you even more brand new Challenges!

Now, you can join premium coach-guided challenges who help you with nutrition and workouts and are just a call away to answer your questions and help you reach your goals. Ready to try them out?
With this update, we introduced product improvements to help you exercise more and get more results. Remember to smile and hydrate!
We’ve worked hard to make the app faster, prettier and more seamless for you. Thanks for using BetterMe and as always, stay fit, healthy, and happy!

We worked hard to bring you upgrades just in time for the new year. 

Now, enjoy:
-localized meal plans
-full-feature app for iPad

Happy holidays from the BetterMe team!

Hooray, we made it to 2021!
We're starting the year off with a new program for seniors, available with this update. Health has no age limit!
As always, we're happy to hear what you think.

It’s a great day for a major feature update! We’re proud to offer you:
- Community: a space to connect with other users and ask your burning questions anonymously
- A brand new Dancing Workout to make exercising even more fun
- Ability to change your chosen Meal Plan at any time
- Ability to choose when to start your Challenge

We hope you like the new features as much as we do. Let us know what you think!

- A brand new Dancing Workout to make exercising even more fun

We hope you like the new features as much as we do. Let us know what you think!

Taking the time to slow down and connect with yourself is part of healthy living, so we added a brand new Self-Care Challenge to help you find your balance, build a new routine, or just take a pause from stress. Check them out in the BetterMe app!

Taking the time to slow down and connect with yourself is part of healthy living, so we added a brand new Self-Care Challenge to help you find your balance, build a new routine, or just take a pause from stress. Check them out in the BetterMe app!

Our Workouts got a facelift! 

With the new navigation and design, you’re now easily able to:
- return to the previous exercise
- extend Rest between exercises
- get audio cues about the end of the exercise
- see burned calories and total time training
- see current exercise countdown

Moreover, we’ve added Back-Protecting, Knee-Protecting, and Stretching Workouts in the app.

Check out the new updates now and let us know what you think!

It's a beautiful day for an update!
We worked hard to improve app performance, and now you can enjoy a smooth experience with walking and running workouts. Try them out and let us know what you think.

Happy spring! It's the perfect time for a refresher. We're happy to bring to you:

- A new, redesigned active workout for easier navigation
- Workout videos that can now be rotated horizontally for a more seamless training experience

Complete a workout today and let us know what you think!

For this year's Global Accessibility Awareness Day, we're happy to add workouts for users with limited mobility. Now, when users select limited mobility option, their experience will be tailored to accommodate their needs. Check out these new workouts in the app now, and as always, thank you for using BetterMe!
